front.title: Templated CDA: key concept for interoperability

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This document supplements information about "templated CDA" in the context of the Healthcare Information Technology (HIT) Standards Analysis Project carried out by Lantana Consulting Group for the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).

seriesInfo.name: NIST GCR; NIST grant-contract report; NIST grant contract report
